abstract: How badly does Oracle, a leader in business software, want to be the one-stop shop for corporate technology purchases? Enough to spend $7.4 billion to buy an ailing Sun Microsystems and enter the computer hardware business.
lead_paragraph: How badly does Oracle, a leader in business software, want to be the one-stop shop for corporate technology purchases? Enough to spend $7.4 billion to buy an ailing Sun Microsystems and enter the computer hardware business.

headline.main: Cash in Hand, Technology Giants Go Shopping
